div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 135 Anavyssos, near Sunium, Attica, c. 1948 Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (Oeconomides, Picard) Contents: 66 AR Athens: 1 tetradr.; 11 dr.; 51 fr. to hemiob. Disposition: Athens 63 as listed above Varoucha, BCH 1949, p. 520 â€ Picard, BCH 1969, p. 828, note 4
